title: 2025-Apr-26 Newly Discovered Subterranean Chambers Under Pyramids Could Rewrite Ancient Egyptian History
content: Archaeologists have uncovered a sprawling network of cylindrical structures beneath the Great Pyramid of Giza, suggesting ancient Egyptians may have harnessed geo-electrical energy from Earth's magnetic field.
